content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Cloud supports personal projects for all EPAM users. Such projects are named by the user's corporate email address. Within personal projects, users can launch and manage virtual machines free of charge. However, virtual infrastructure usage within personal projects is subject to quotas depending on job function level with Level 1 employees getting the lowest quota and Level 4+ staff – the highest one.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can activate a personal project and create resources there even if your UPSA project is not activated in Cloud yet.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Resources in personal projects should be used for educational and training purposes only, and should not be used for project needs.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To activate your personal project, log in to the\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://cloud.epam.com/maestro2/ui/home\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Cloud Management Console\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"and click Activate Personal Project.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d409b1ee-85a7-4886-86e7-fbaa28c8ffd5/image2016-12-6%2016:43:29.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":226,\"height\":226}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When your personal project is activated, your will receive a confirmation by
